transcript.sentence: The following preview has been approved for appropriate audiences.
The united states armed services recruitment center is shown during world war ii. Men and women are walking all about.
A young captain america is shown standing in line in the recruitment center
before a doctor. The doctor is reading over his medical records. He is undersized and larger men are standing behind him, as well as in a waiting area surrounding him.
The doctor stamps rejected on his medical fitness application.
Paramount pictures presents.
A marvel studios production.
A drill sergeant stands before his men.
A young captain america is attacked in an alley way.
Captain america is talking to his close friend. His friend is in military uniform.
Captain america is talking to a military scientist.
Explosions on a military base.
Captain america walks into a military lab with a sign of surprise on his face.

The lab is in an octagon configuration. There are about twenty scientists in white lab coats walking around, working with a large old computer machinery. In the center of a room. There is a capsule about the size of a man.
Captain america proceeds to lie down horizontally in the capsule.
One nurse gives him a large injection.
The capsule closes around him and then maneuvers into an upright position.
The laboratory equipment is turned on, and captain america chose a painful grimace on his face.
The capsule radiates with light before the scientific equipment explodes in sparks.
Paramount pictures and marvel studios presents.
The capsule opens up in there stands captain america a foot taller and having gained about a hundred pounds of lean muscle.
The scientists look on and admiration and astonishment.
A quick scene shows captain america running very quickly through the streets without a shirt.
A soviet submarine travels under water. Captain america swims after it, holding on to it, and then punches through the window of the submarine.
Captain america holds onto the submarine captain by the collar and attempts to interrogate him.
Hundreds of soviet soldiers are shown in a room saluting by throwing two fists outwards.
A high ranking soviet officer removes a mask, seemingly skin to reveal a beet red face.
Captain america now with his red, white and blue shield and full blue uniform, burst through a door with three other military companions.
A truck outside explodes as the four run through the forest, firing guns.
This summer.
Two men with flame throwers on each arm surround captain america, bringing the fire ever closer.
Discover.
Captain America rides through the forest on a motorcycle pursued by seven other men on motorcycles wearing all black.
The world's first.
Captain america charges an enemy soldier using a shield. He violently strikes the soldier, throwing the soldier into the air in slow motion.
Avenger,
Captain america.
The first adventure.
Captain america stands in a military laboratory with two friends. One friend draws a gun while he holds a shield.

result.title: Captain America: The First Avenger - Trailer
result.description:
Behold the birth of the first Avenger in this first full-length trailer!

http://www.CaptainAmerica.com

Hey, True Believers! Have you "Liked" the Marvel Facebook page? If not, click here: http://www.facebook.com/Marvel

And don't forget to "Like" the "Captain America: The First Avenger" Facebook page too: http://www.facebook.com/CaptainAmericaMovie
